Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Right! Let me see what I can decipher.<sp:5:0:0>


Hmm...
Talk_57:
We'll establish a base in the<clr:0000> Popla
Foothills<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> <clr:ffff>at the<clr:0000> Skyview Tower by
the ruins<clr:ffff>.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I must study more about the Zonai
civilization so I don't fall behind
Tauro and Calip.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'll also continue pursuing our research
of the Ring Ruins...

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>And as the village chief, making this an
exciting place of course.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>We have you to thank for all that we
accomplished here, Master Link. From
the bottom of my heart, thank you.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hm?


<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Ah! You're right!


Paya knows her stuff. This should be read
as "<clr:0000>dragon land<clr:ffff>...<clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff>."

Fantastic work, Paya!
Talk_76:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_01>No, not that. The next bit.


A certain adjective was used? <sp:5:0:0>I believe
it started with "fan" and ended with
"tastic"? What was it again?
Talk_77:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Ahem.<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Where were we?<sp:5:1:0> Something about a
dragon land to the southeast?
Talk_78:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>"Calip, what fantastic work!" he said.<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<snd:Happy_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>Fantastic... Me!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I must study more about the Zonai
civilization so I don't fall behind
Tauro and Calip.
<sp:3:0:2:0301>Yet it seems somewhat frivolous next to
the mystery of the real Princess Zelda's
whereabouts.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I don't doubt that she is safe and well.
I must believe that.

<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>As chief of this village, I can't leave
my people, so I must place the search
in your capable hands.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I pray that Princess Zelda will return to
us soon.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Oh, thank goodness I've proven useful!
It seems my continued Zonai-language
studies have paid off.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hmm.<sp:5:1:0> How familiar are you with southeast
Hyrule? There's a site in Faron that has
long been known as the <clr:0000>Zonai Ruins<clr:ffff>.
It predates the ruins falling from the sky,
and is home to many ancient relics.

If memory serves, there were dragon
designs on those ruins that I haven't
seen anywhere else.
Talk_62:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>In search of new discoveries...


<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>WE MAKE FOR FARON!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:LaughL_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Oho, Calip! Great catch!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0801><sp:0:2:2:7d00>The <clr:0000>Zonai Ruins in Faron<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_63:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease_01>They left, just like that.<sp:5:1:0> Well, I'm sure
those two will be fine.
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>Aha! <sp:5:0:0>The inscriptions are telling us all
sorts of essential information!
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>There's a good chance that's exactly
what this is pointing us at.
Talk_69:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Link, when we put together the script on
this stone slab and translate it...

We get definite mentions of the Sage
Mineru, the Demon King, and someone
with the same name as Princess Zelda.
Something related to all three of them
must be waiting at the Zonai Ruins in
southeast Hyrule!
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>We've landed a real catch here!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Thank you for your help. Truly.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now, we've no time to dawdle. There's
research to be done!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>What's this you've got?


<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>Could it...<sp:5:0:0> Could it really be...
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Could this be...<sp:5:0:0>the interior of the floating
Ring Ruin?!<sp:5:1:0>

Wow! <sp:5:0:0>The stone slab is so clearly visible!
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_01>Oh, nothing. It's just...<sp:5:0:0> That part before
the "southeast" section...

I think it says...<sp:5:0:0>"dragon land."
Talk_70:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>That...this inscription is pointing us
toward Faron's <clr:0000>Zonai Ruins<clr:ffff>?
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>There appear to be Zonai inscriptions
on this one as well, just like in the other
Ring Ruins. Tauro, if you would?
Talk_71:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Hee-hee, yes! Fantastic work! <sp:5:1:0>That is
what you said!

Hm. Yes.
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>"...promise...Zelda...<sp:5:1:0>solemnly signed...<sp:5:1:0>
Mineru, Sage of...

"...hide the key...<sp:5:1:0>southeast... Entrust...
future...wish...<sp:5:1:0>defeat...Demon King..."

That's all I can make out.


There's some lettering I can't figure out
before "southeast," but "<clr:0000>Mineru<clr:ffff>" seems
to be someone's name.
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hmm. Look at the context of "Mineru."<sp:5:0:0>
I do believe this is the first time one of
these slabs has put a name to a sage!<sp:0:4:0>It also mentions "Zelda" and a "Demon
King."<sp:5:0:0> How fascinating!
Talk_73:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>Of course! I would be a...*ahem*...
fantastic addition to the team.
Talk_56:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_01>Very good! With that settled, let's be off
to the <clr:0000>Zonai Ruins<clr:ffff> in<clr:0000> Faron<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>First we head <clr:0000>southwest<clr:ffff>...
